Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 9.403 Å × 11.408 Å × 6.801 Å (2D layer grid cavity), 4.5×5.3 Å, 3.4×4.5 Å, 1.8×3.9 Å (small pore windows)

Other Information.Additional Info: Adsorption amount: 86.2 cm³·g⁻¹ (2.74 mmol·g⁻¹) at 298 K and 1 bar.
Adsorption amount: 25.5 cm³·g⁻¹ (1.14 mmol·g⁻¹) at 298 K and 1 bar.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: C2H2/C2H4 selectivity: 17.5 to 12.6 in the range of 0-100 kPa at 298 K; Breakthrough points: C2H4 = 3.85 mmol/g, C2H2 = 8.38 mmol/g; Purity of C2H4 > 99.996%

Other Information.Additional Info: The material combines sieving effects and pore space partitioning, with open Cd(II) sites and π…π interactions contributing to acetylene adsorption.
